content:
@Bhavik Mehta, @Kevin Buzzard, has the fate of the earlier sheaves-on-spaces code been decided? Are we going to attempt to discard it all, and solely use the new sheaves-on-sites code? Or build bridges and keep both?

(I hope the first option is viable!)

I think both options are viable, and there hasn't really been much discussion on this - I thought we were going to build bridges and keep both, but I have no objection to try discarding the spaces code.
